verses.verse: In thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, do I take refuge <WH2620>: Let me never <WH408> be put to shame <WH954>.
Deliver <WH5337> me in thy righteousness <WH6666>, and rescue <WH6403> me <WH5186>: Bow down thine ear <WH241> unto me <WH3467>, and save me.

Be thou to me a rock <WH6697> of habitation <WH4583>, whereunto I may continually <WH8548> resort <WH935>: Thou hast given commandment <WH6680> to save <WH3467> me <WH5553>; For thou art my rock and my fortress <WH4686>.
Rescue <WH6403> me <WH430>, O my God, out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>, Out of the hand <WH3709> of the unrighteous <WH5765> and cruel man <WH2556>.
For thou art my hope <WH8615>, O Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Thou art my trust <WH4009> from my youth <WH5271>.
By thee have I been holden up <WH5564> from the womb <WH990>; Thou art he that took <WH1491> me out of my mother <WH517>'s bowels <WH4578>: My praise <WH8416> shall be continually of thee <WH8548>.
I am as a wonder <WH4159> unto many <WH7227>; But thou art my strong <WH5797> refuge <WH4268>.
My mouth <WH6310> shall be filled <WH4390> with thy praise <WH8416>, And with thy honor <WH8597> all the day <WH3117>.
Cast me not off <WH7993> in the time <WH6256> of old age <WH2209>; Forsake <WH5800> me not when my strength <WH3581> faileth <WH3615>.
For mine enemies <WH341> speak <WH559> concerning me <WH8104>; And they that watch for my soul <WH5315> take counsel <WH3289> together <WH3162>,
Saying <WH559>, God <WH430> hath forsaken <WH5800> him <WH7291>: Pursue and take <WH8610> him <WH5337>; For there is none to deliver.
O God <WH430>, be not far <WH7368> from me <WH430>; O my God, make haste <WH2363> to help me <WH5833>.

Let them be put to shame <WH954> and consumed <WH3615> that are adversaries <WH7853> to my soul <WH5315>; Let them be covered <WH5844> with reproach <WH2781> and dishonor <WH3639> that seek <WH1245> my hurt <WH7451>.
But I will hope <WH3176> continually <WH8548>, And will praise <WH8416> thee yet more <WH3254> and more <WH3254>.
My mouth <WH6310> shall tell <WH5608> of thy righteousness <WH6666>, And of thy salvation <WH8668> all the day <WH3117>; For I know <WH3045> not the numbers thereof <WH5615>.
I will come <WH935> with the mighty <WH1369> acts of the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: I will make mention <WH2142> of thy righteousness <WH6666>, even of thine only.
O God <WH430>, thou hast taught <WH3925> me from my youth <WH5271>; And hitherto have I declared <WH5046> thy wondrous works <WH6381>.

Yea <WH5704>, even when I am old <WH2209> and grayheaded <WH7872>, O God <WH430>, forsake <WH5800> me not <WH5046>, Until I have declared thy strength <WH2220> unto the next generation <WH1755>, Thy might <WH1369> to every one that is to come <WH935>.
Thy righteousness <WH6666> also <WH430>, O God, is very high <WH4791>; Thou who hast done <WH6213> great things <WH1419>, O God <WH430>, who is like unto thee?

Thou <WH7200>, who hast showed us many <WH7227> and sore <WH7451> troubles <WH6869>, Wilt quicken <WH2421> us again <WH7725>, And wilt bring us up <WH5927> again <WH7725> from the depths <WH8415> of the earth <WH776>.
Increase <WH7235> thou my greatness <WH1420>, And turn again <WH5437> and comfort me <WH5162>.

I will also praise <WH3034> thee with the psaltery <WH3627>, Even thy truth <WH571>, O my God <WH430>: Unto thee will I sing <WH2167> praises with the harp <WH3658>, O thou Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>.
My lips <WH8193> shall shout for joy <WH7442> when I sing <WH2167> praises unto thee <WH5315>; And my soul, which thou hast redeemed <WH6299>.

My tongue <WH3956> also shall talk <WH1897> of thy righteousness <WH6666> all the day <WH3117> long <WH954>; For they are put to shame, for they are confounded <WH954>, that seek <WH1245> my hurt <WH7451>.
